part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is tough but the meal is filling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Raw bear flesh is tinctured in its own spilled blood.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes awful, but it meets the bare necessities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Raw pig flesh is tinctured in its own spilled blood.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It would taste better salted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Raw boar flesh is tinctured in its own spilled blood.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It would taste better salted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Raw barkbiter flesh is tinctured in its own spilled blood.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It would taste better salted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bug muscle is heaped and plated on broken shell.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The taste is bitter and salty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Raw goat flesh is tinctured in its own spilled blood.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat strips dissolve into salt and fat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bug muscle is heaped and plated on broken exobone.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's tangy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Frog leg is tinctured in its own spilled blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Flesh of cheek and jowl is tinged with the smell of salt.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's flaky and tasty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Worm flesh is tinctured in its own spilled slick.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mosaic of keeled scales coils like a wound rope. It's crusted with char and smells like smoke.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes of spiced char with a swelling heat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A four-chambered slab of wet and raw tissue slumps under its own sopping weight.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's chewy and tastes of warm rust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A four-chambered slab of wet and raw tissue slumps under its own sopping weight.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's chewy and tastes of warm rust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pinches of opal black fur stick to the wet leg meat.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Smokey and tasty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A triad of tongues are twined together in a fibrous twist. They gleam with a coat of saliva.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The taste is familiar on your tongue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Jointed and spined legs are arrayed in a pool of bone jelly.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Enormous jointed and spined legs are arrayed in a pool of bone jelly.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A halo of smoke lifts off the calcified orb.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's a tough chew with red-hot spice.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A paper-thin bowl of bone is etched with the bright and furcate marks of lightning.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It crackles on your taste buds.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It melts in your mouth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Space is partitioned across three displacement chambers to create negative pressure around the shunting organ.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A labyrinth of nerves poke through their limpid tissue wrapper.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The gland ruptures with a pop and fills your mouth with a cold fluid. Someone else's memories seep into your own

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ageless bone was pulverized and compacted inside the scarred intestine of a bone worm.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: There's a satisfying crunch.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The gland ruptures with a pop and fills your mouth with its foul fluid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and scorches the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and scorches the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and freezes the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and freezes the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and stings the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and stings the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and polarizes the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and polarizes the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and stings the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and stings the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and makes humid the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and makes humid the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and arrests the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and arrests the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and obfuscates the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue and obfuscates the surrounding air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The fluted stem of tassled yonderbrush bends to a farpoint out of focus.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes like far away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A little nub of cork swells with moisture. It was watered over hot weeks by a splayed frond, vested with inhuman patience, who sucked one mote of rain from a hundred-mile wind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Earth scars brook the cinnamon bulb, warped by the pressures of soil and chrome to a shape that encodes a chiliad of ruin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Juice drips off the bright skin sheathing the quincunx core. To eyes wet with hunger, it shines like a garnet in the vulcan salt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A rib of fractus shoots a wet and pointy pear off its sunbloated greenery.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Beneath a cap of spread gills, the stem contours to a bursting waist. The fungus is fat on the dead of its sliver of loam.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The truffle is encrusted with a wine-colored char residue born of gases unknown to the world-surface. Deep, deep in the earth and across the Pale Sea, it was smoldered to succulence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rime sparkles on the lampshade cap that glows with soft biolumin.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 180-220 rounds You cast light in radius 2. For the first 5 rounds after imbibing, you gain 0.6 hit points per level (minimum 3) each round. +20 cold resistance You cannot be poisoned.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sight senses blur on spongent craters of a swollen coral moon. Is this the flesh of gods?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pungent, ochre-toned petals look like an aromatic herb, but their savory flavor is closer to broth than tisane.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Savory, but not particularly satisfying.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bleached cyan grave moss has grown into a rare and supple clump.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It crunches into flakes in your mouth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its spline is richly hued in ripeness, and Spindle glitter dots the peel.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes disgustingly bitter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Children cry at the crisp snip of a yuckwheat stem, as they have for hundreds of years. They bawl, and flail, and writhe from their mothers' grasps, deaf to reassurances of the plant's medical potency. Snipped and crushed, the stem tastes acidic on their tongues and their faces contort in children's agony. But they sleep better at night, so their mothers say.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Starchy dendrites were slashed from the earth and shaved down.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light drips off the lunes' boundaries of influence and seeps into the void.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: They're freezing with the absence of heat and light.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Prototypically delicious.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Earth-dense juice pressures the berry skin into a perfect and light-curving sphere. Inside, a pip encodes a millionfold instruction set for the shape of shapes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Millennia of chymified metropolis that's fed the grass-coral-fungi hybrid shadow-forking in its guts are resorbed inside the seed coat of an eco wad.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Beams of snug warmth sprout like fractals inside your body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a choice cut of laminated sponge. It jiggles to the touch.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's chewier than anything you've eaten before.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shard of glass shines on sharp edges, its crack patterns characteristic of geologic pressure-tempering.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's sharp and shimmering.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Starbright grass peaked at a local maximum of meaning and then was cut and bundled.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes of fuzz.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stalk of red celery is floured in the abraded dust of centuries.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The heart of the jilted lover burns under embered petals, pinched to anguish in citrine anthers and laid on a weeping bed of sepal jade.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Seasoning the minced meat that's trapped under the crust is a smidge of yyffur dust, shaved from the stalk of the eponymous mushroom and finely ground. The whole mushroom is much too powerful for a mammalian psyche (consuming one would obliterate the ego in mere moments), but a smidge of dust on a tasty pie can remind one of one's place in the cosmos.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes bitter. Your {{Y|Ego}} is reduced by {{C|1}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long and warted neck of mint green was fruited on a fertile vine and picked crisp.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The bite is crisp, and then it bursts into water.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: A divine crisp dissolves into salted manna.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thin and ancient paper, a palimpsest of grease, wraps the crisp saddle of fried wafer. Seven strata of congealed nectar fill the crispy cleft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Psychal energy hovers near the zero-point as soft fuzz but peaks in the tetrahedral habit. This crystal was cracked off a root-bouquet before the system could develop chime-sentience. It vibrates with nascent thought and feeling.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The crystal shatters and concentrated thoughtstuff swells in tide and soaks your mind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cheesecloth sticks to the greasy faces of a pigwrought cuboid. For two years microbes have colonized its faces, ripening it to high taste.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smooth and sunstriped shells insulate the explosive treeshoot to come.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sweet starapples were mashed, set over an open flame, left out to cool, and jarred for later use. Bits of stringy pulp lay suspended in the fruity aether.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The spiny fruit of fracti were mashed, set over an open flame, left out to cool, and jarred for later use. Bits of spiny pulp lay suspended in the fruity aether.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bunched wafers reaped from the moisture-sucking watervine plant and bound by twine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plucked from the dirt, they live their new lives wading in the brine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wrinkled toadstools were cooled and dehydrated in their own hoarfrost.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warted fruits are set as islands in an ocean of brine and jarred in a world glass. They rot at salt's pace now.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Calefaction was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salt has blanched the prism of colors out of the cuts of coiled meat, but a tinge of the smell of smoke remains.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chitin was shaved from the exoskeletal flank of a caught salthopper and dry-beaten to a snappy crisp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spooled thread cut from the dual-dimensional hearth-mesh of a phase spider.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Weeks old salt crystals line the fluted valleys of a wet stalk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Weeks old salt crystals huddle in the stem's elbowed forks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Air-shunting arciforms were ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The scutum was scraped dry, smashed, and ground. Bits of the tick were squeezed of its magnetic lifeblood and vialed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dried, these thick yellow-brown petals bear a closer resemblance to meat jerky than most other flowers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light drips off the dried lunes' boundaries of influence and seeps into the void.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ageless bone was pulverized and compacted inside the scarred intestine of a bone worm. Then it was ground into meal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Grave moss grew into a rare and supple clump, which was then crushed and placed on a spice tray.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Peeled lagroot tuber was mashed, salted, and jarred.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Moisture was baked out of fruit by the salt sun, but Spindle glitter still alights the disc-chip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Memory-soaked nerves were ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An artifact of the mirror world was shattered and ground to fine dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The stencil on the tin depicts an animal with claws, or are they hooves? Snoods (or horns? antlers?) pucker its nose and brow. Shaggy, knotted fur, or ruffled feathers, sheath it from the heat (or cold).

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Every autumn, many gulch dwellers hike to the Stiltgrounds to purchase the Fall wine. They return to their homes, steep wheat bran in the wine, and leaven dough in their clay ovens. A few are luckier; fungus grove dwellers need only step outside to harvest yeast, and friends to fungi need only shake their yeast-ridden appendages.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Malachite leaves and pistachios are bound by star twine. The greens puff gallantly at the absence of toxins in the air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spongy foodstuff molded into a slate-hued cube of perfect proportions. What forces married the messiness of eating with the precision of cubes?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chopped tongue was soured in its own saliva and twisted around a stick.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A choice cut of laminated sponge was carved into serving slices. They jiggle to the touch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plum-white rice hulls fizzle to the touch and their awns groan an erratic and lyrical sound.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dreamstuff was quickened into memory and bottled before it could evaporate to emotional humidity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bear flesh was cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bear flesh was cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Boar flesh was cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mashed beetle meat was cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Croc flesh was cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crab legs were cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Frog meat was cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Goat flesh was cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Worm meat was cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mashed scorpiock meat was cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fish meat was cut into neat strips, salted, and smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mist-damp tissues were ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scorched tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scorched tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Frosted tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Frosted tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tart tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tart tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hexagonal tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hexagonal tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Toxic tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Toxic tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Deflated tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Deflated tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Still tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Still tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Strange tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Strange tissue was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shade oil was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blaze was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salve was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ubernostrum was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Eaters' nectar was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hulk honey was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skulk was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Love was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rubbergum was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.
